02a518fe7de0d3d0c1fd77ee243ab5f1968ed62f.query: SELECT id, text from statements where id = ?

059ea7af2a63c2c76cb495f6080b1fd6b5a03045.query:
select s.id as statement_id, s.text as statement_text, timestamp as vote_timestamp, vote from vote_history v
            join statements s on s.id = v.statement_id
            where user_id = ? and vote != 0
            order by timestamp desc

3141d724e269dc4bc2d8b7d09c4d61c40c05b58c.query: insert into queue (user_id, statement_id) select user_id, ? from votes where statement_id = ? and vote = 1 or vote = -1 on conflict do nothing

37d50549384b63a505328d00a6f23829a4a80ce6.query:
INSERT INTO votes (statement_id, user_id, vote)
            VALUES (?, ?, ?)
            on CONFLICT (statement_id, user_id)
            do UPDATE SET vote = excluded.vote

395153efc686f78e317638a5d0fc21865c7d8cee.query:
insert or replace into statement_stats (statement_id, yes_votes, no_votes, skip_votes, itdepends_votes)
              select
            statement_id,
              coalesce(sum(vote == 1), 0) as yes_votes,
              coalesce(sum(vote == -1), 0) as no_votes,
              coalesce(sum(vote == 0), 0) as skip_votes,
              coalesce(sum(vote == 2), 0) as itdepends_votes
              from votes
              where statement_id = ?
              group by statement_id

45c1971f51dfcdb223f5269f194cc8b8c3b35c98.query: insert into queue (user_id, statement_id) select ?, followup_id from followups where statement_id = ? on conflict do nothing

4ccd7d6e3c8d14459413cb7941e8f4f73f15b73a.query: select 1 as subscription from subscriptions where user_id = ? and statement_id = ?

75fe5c149645183d120fd6b07c2d1cc50fdf28f4.query: select vote from votes where user_id = ? and statement_id = ?

7c0016f1d57f360ccd50022c00e10e12418dbc8e.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM authors where user_id = ?

9d628a139bcb5376e9d685b3052c9d78940db9ce.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM votes where user_id = ?

9d9cc8b6aa02305b9c83ae238781fe1e81416c8c.query: select followup_id from followups where statement_id = ?

a32c2dc990c0b7f41bb9305aab078a6e9421622c.query: SELECT id, secret from users WHERE secret = ?

ae550accf826fc7f7448e0f58ac016364bd62dcd.query:
insert or replace into statement_stats (statement_id, subscriptions)
            values (?, 1) on conflict (statement_id) do update set subscriptions = statement_stats.subscriptions + 1

b0bfa8b55bcebabbd2abf5e60388a91fa92da050.query: insert into subscriptions (user_id, statement_id) values (?, ?) on conflict do nothing

bfc1c7084becef57aae0b9be819b72b970188937.query: insert into queue (user_id, statement_id) select user_id, ? from subscriptions where statement_id = ? on conflict do nothing

d38f1ea03d56233b70403c20b9c68c2fd1d7d87a.query: INSERT INTO vote_history (user_id, statement_id, vote) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

eb249830a9036b2c77f7db1436bec513f4c4555a.query: INSERT INTO statements (text) VALUES (?) RETURNING id

f7b847cb2f6a602ac272f30c5b8bb2dffd9a139f.query: delete from queue where user_id = ? and statement_id = ?
